thread.section_title: The Westin Paris - Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel - Review of The Westin Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tiberiu C
title: Beautiful hotel
text:
Beautiful hotel. Very helpful staff. Superb courtyard. Ideal for private events. Great SPA.
Incredible view over Jardin de Tuilleries and La Tour Eiffel. It seemed to me that I was looking at a postcard, not out of my window.
Also, being right next to the Tuilleries Gardens, you can go jogging in a fantastic parc, early in the morning. You only have to cross the street.
Room Tip: My standard room was very beautiful, but somewhat small. See more room tips
